events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah Johnson has been assigned to the case to assist with the refund process.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Thank you, here is my order number 123456 and I have attached photos showing the item I got does not match the description.
We have reviewed your photos and order details. We can process a full refund or resend the correct item, please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to get a refund instead of another shipment. Thank you for handling this quickly.
Your refund has been approved and processed. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As there are no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
